field.name: Stake Amount
field.description: Some WEEV must be given as collateral to discourage malicious behavior

field.name: Registry Name
field.description: Provide a name to identify and describe the registry

field.name: Stake per Registration
field.description: Set the amount in WEEV device owners must stake as collateral when registering a device. This helps ensure the data can be trusted

field.name: Stake per Validator
field.description: Set the amount in WEEV validator's must stake as collateral. Validator's check that devices conform to registry standards.

field.name: Stake per Arbiter
field.description: Set the amount in WEEV arbiter's must stake as collateral. Arbiters serve the purpose of dispute resolution on specific transaction types.
